task_description: Initial Xcode project setup for Bodii iOS app with Clean Architecture scaffolding and Core Data model

patterns.architecture: MVVM + Clean Architecture Hybrid with 5 layers: App, Presentation, Domain, Data, Infrastructure, Shared
patterns.file_structure: MARK comments for sections: Protocol, Properties, Initialization, Public Methods, Private Methods, Extensions, Preview
patterns.dependency_rule: Presentation → Domain ← Data, Infrastructure → Domain. Domain has NO external dependencies.
patterns.core_data_model: 9 entities from ERD: User, BodyRecord, MetabolismSnapshot, Food, FoodRecord, ExerciseRecord, SleepRecord, DailyLog, Goal
patterns.naming: UpperCamelCase for types, lowerCamelCase for variables/functions, Protocol suffix for protocols

existing_implementations.description: Greenfield project - no existing code. Documentation provides patterns and requirements.
relevant_docs: docs/04_ERD.md - Complete entity schemas with attributes, relationships, indexes, and data types
docs/06_DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.md - Architecture, folder structure, coding conventions, file templates

constraints: SwiftUI only - no UIKit or Storyboards (except LaunchScreen if needed)
Domain layer must have zero external dependencies (pure Swift)
No business logic implementation - scaffolding only
